summary:
AU where Voldemort had a nose, but he has no ears. (He can speak because he learned talking when he was little)
Voldemort in The...
body:
AU where Voldemort had a nose, but he has no ears. (He can speak because he learned talking when he was little)

Voldemort in The Deathly Hallows: Guys, Harry Potter is here, I can smell it! And all the death eaters are doing super quick sign language. When Voldemort says that Harry is dead but he comes alive, in the place of shouting every death eater moves their hands super fast and everybody is super confused like what does this mean? Is this a new spell?

reblog.comment:
AU where Voldemort had a nose, but he has no ears. (He can speak because he learned talking when he was little)

Voldemort in The Deathly Hallows: Guys, Harry Potter is here, I can smell it! And all the death eaters are doing super quick sign language. When Voldemort says that Harry is dead but he comes alive, in the place of shouting every death eater moves their hands super fast and everybody is super confused like what does this mean? Is this a new spell?

blog.name: miko2495
blog.title: My main headquaters
blog.description: This is where I post the random stuff that comes to my head

summary: Oh right, that AU
title: Oh right, that AU
body:
Looking back at my posts, I was reminded that I was going to tell you all about and AU I made before I got side tracked with OCs. Anyway, here it is:

In this AU, MC is in their late teens and doing well in school. However, an incident occurred and a lot of finger are pointing at MC. There are two ways this AU could go:

1. The teachers believe that MC has caused a lot of trouble over the years so they expel them

OR

2. MC is proven innocent but they had enough of the school’s bullshit and dropped out.

Either way, MC is no longer attending Hogwarts but they have some clues on where their brother is. Soon after, MCs friends (including Rowan) also drops out of Hogwarts to join MC and the group travel around the world, gathering clues to solve the mystery of the missing brother

Thomas. 23. Italian. Male. Feminist. Literal Pile of Salt. Asexual. Aromantic. Bisexual. Massive Nerd.
English isn't my first language. Ravenclaw. Evil Overlord. I tend to be Sappy about my OTPs and Salty about my NOTPs.

summary: Every Harry Potter/Harem fic would have been 100 times better if they were Neville and/or Luna X Harem fics instead and YOU KNOW...
body:
Every Harry Potter/Harem fic would have been 100 times better if they were Neville and/or Luna X Harem fics instead and YOU KNOW IT.

Which would really make them good given how fucked up some of those were, but at least it was something.

reblog.comment:
Every Harry Potter/Harem fic would have been 100 times better if they were Neville and/or Luna X Harem fics instead and YOU KNOW IT.

tags: etc etc etc etc etc etc etc etc......
summary: I think I would have shipped Ginny and Harry if they had constant interaction throughout the books. Like not romantic even just...
caption: I think I would have shipped Ginny and Harry if they had constant interaction throughout the books. Like not romantic even just friendly interaction. It just feels like harry didn’t even think about Ginny that much? Like he didn’t notice her until it was time for the sudden romance to start. He had more thoughts about and interaction with the twins for heaven sakes! Why didn’t he end up with them lol

reblog.comment: I think I would have shipped Ginny and Harry if they had constant interaction throughout the books. Like not romantic even just friendly interaction. It just feels like harry didn’t even think about Ginny that much? Like he didn’t notice her until it was time for the sudden romance to start. He had more thoughts about and interaction with the twins for heaven sakes! Why didn’t he end up with them lol

summary: Imagine being a student at Hogwarts and being great at quidditch but bad at general school. There’s nothing stopping you from...
body: Imagine being a student at Hogwarts and being great at quidditch but bad at general school. There’s nothing stopping you from running out of fucks to give during a match/practise, fly away and apparate as soon as you’re outside the grounds

caption:
postwar marauders, 1985

the dark lord is defeated and the wizarding world rejoices;

members of fringe movements are being rounded up

and brought to justice swiftly and without prejudice

but then, the end is only just another beginning.

index | canons | face claims | requests

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
